A modernized USACO theme with better reading experience.

‚öôÔ∏èHow to use

First, install Stylus extension for Chrome / your browser

Method 1 

(This works very slow in China)

Go to https://userstyles.org , search for "USACO Modernized".

Method 2

Click the Stylus icon while you are visiting the homepage of usaco.org, then click on the www.usaco.org/this URL button.

Download the usaco-modernized.css file, copy all the content into the window below "Code 1:" .
